desc: Four generations of footwear and we’ve still got spring in our step! Since 1919

layout.text: Four generations of footwear and we’ve still got spring in our step! Since 1919, American Shoe has been dedicated to supplying our customers with a wide  (and sometimes narrow and medium!) selection of footwear. From fashion to function, Summer to Winter, we do it all! And with 101 years in the footwear business, we know a thing or two about fitting shoes. We’d love to help you find your next favorite pair! It’s a long road, so think on your feet!… At American Shoe
